name: Connector for MClimate Vicki (TRV over LoRa) and HomeAssistant through MQTT
Merge Lora data with prefious data
Update HA device config
Update HA sensorData
set command from Home Assistant
Send lora downlink
"vicki_settings" to flow variable
manual request Vicki version and temperature range
Don't use it to often because there is a limit/fair-use-policy for downlink messages with public Lora servers
info: Also uplinks should no bet set more frequently then every 4 minutes, better to use 10 or 15 minutes
